# *All models are wrong, but some are useful* # Welcome to Ecological Modeling (BI382) at Colby College! ## *All models are wrong, but some are useful*—George Box, 1979, **Robustness in Statistics4** This is the homepage for Ecological Modeling (BI382) at Colby College.
